title: Is it Halal to accept a waiver or grant on tuition fees if I cheated in college?  assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: safe from Bangladesh so and a waiver in tuition fees okay given from any from my University uh based on my school certificate result and admission test and can I accept it because uh I've cheated in my School exams but not in the admission test if you if if this waiver is a gift in accordance to what you have achieved on their premises and you did not cheat on that particular exam whether it's an entry exam or whatever kind of exams they have provided you and you did well and they gave you a waiver this is okay but if you cheated on it no you cannot take that
